DefiningCitation: R. J. (1982) Measurement of premorbid adjustment in chronic schizophrenia. Schizophrenia Bulletin
Premorbid Adjustment Scale.Definition: The Premorbid Adjustment Scale (PAS) is a rating scale for use in schizophrenia. It evaluates the degree of achievement of developmental goals at each of several periods of a subject's life before the onset of schizophrenia
